modName: Scale Armor by FastestDog - Re-colour Version 1_2
summary:
SCALE ARMOUR BY FASTESTDOG: Removes that awful yellow tint from Scale Armour! Applies smoothly over *ANY* Scale Armour meshes you're using!

**MALE AND FEMALE!! :) **

**FULLY COMPATIBLE WITH MAK/CHRONO'S REMODELED CBBE SET & CALIENTE'S VANILLA!! :) **
descriptionHtml:
[b][SIZE=7]*I've left this mod up for sentimental reasons, really. For SeveNBase & UNPB Armours, or character presets, see my main modpages.*[/size][/b]


[b]LATEST VERSION: W.I.P. TESTING VERSION 1.2 (see Main File under Downloads):[/b]

- Adjusted colouring of female cuirass, bringing it closer in tone to the male version.

UNINSTALL ANY/ALL PREVIOUS VERSIONS, REPLACE WITH LATEST VERSION. Usual drill. :)



[b]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My first ever game-mod, and first upload here to Skyrimnexus! Please play nice! :)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]

[SIZE="5"][b]APPLIES TO: FULL SET, BOTH SEXES. ARMOUR, BOOTS, BRACERS, HELM.[/B][/SIZE]

[b]*Also applies to "Horned Scale" Bandit armour set!* :)[/b]


This is a (very) basic re-colour of Skyrim's Scale Armour textures for both male and female models, attempting to tone-down the bright yellow wash used in the vanilla version.

This is very much a Work-in-Progress, so please feel free to download it and test it in-game! If you can offer any helpful feedback, please refer to the "Discussion Thread", located at:

[SIZE="5"][b][url='http://www.thenexusforums.com/index.php?/topic/514374-basic-scale-armour-re-colour-wip/'][WIP]Basic Scale Armour Re-colour[/url][/B][/SIZE]

You will find a number of pics, as well as links to the various resources used.



[u][b]ADDITIONAL NOTES:[/b][/u]

"Scale" armour in Skyrim is basically "heavy" Hide armour. Hide Armour itself is the "light" version. Thus, this mod should not conflict with any other mod which affects only the "light" files in the "Hide" armour texture & mesh files.

For example, I am using my Scale Armour Re-colour with [url='http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1322']Bernado Neve's excellent "Complete Re-texture for Studded Armor"[/url], which affects the Hide and Leather sets, and am experiencing no conflicts at all (in fact, if it's not too cheeky, I'd say they all work together very nicely!). I highly recommend it! :)



[u][b]INSTALLATION:[/b][/u]

Hey there! :)


This is a W.I.P. test-version of this mod, mainly to test-out a number of things including:

- whether or not it works in-game for other people

- uploading a file, and pics, and posting on Skynexus

- to guage what kind of feedback people are able to offer in terms of improvement going forward


Either install using the Nexus Mod Manager, available at: [url='http://www.skyrimnexus.com/content/modmanager/']SkyrimNexus[/url]

Or install manually by extracting the included "Data" file to your Skyrim folder, usually located in 32-bit systems at:
C:Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrim or similar.



[u][b]DIRECTIONS FOR USE:[/b][/u]

Use, Test, and Enjoy! And please don't hesitate to offer any helpful feedback you may have to offer on the "Discussion" thread at the Skyrimnexus forums, located at:

[SIZE="5"][b][url='http://www.thenexusforums.com/index.php?/topic/514374-basic-scale-armour-re-colour-wip/'][WIP]Basic Scale Armour Re-colour[/url] :)[/B][/SIZE]


[SIZE="5"][b]CREDIT AND MANY THANKS GO TO LHAMMONDS FOR HELPING ME GET THE LINKS WORKING IN THIS DESCRIPTION!!!! :) [/b][/size]
author: FastestDogInTheDistrict
